struct.exostring: // SCRIPTED/DIALOGUE // upon leaving the matale estate before finished the sandral-matale romance plot
// SCRIPTED/DIALOGUE // upon uniting shen and rahasia
// SCRIPTED/DIALOGUE // upon returning shen to ahlan

// SCRIPTED/DIALOGUE // upon approaching the entrance to the matale residence before completing the sandral-matale romance
Dialog Mission Statement This dialog is for the droid guarding the Matale estate. When the player approaches, the droid initiates dialog with him. If the player manages to convince the droid to let him see Ahlan, the player is transported to the Matale main hall.
The first dialog is when the player has not yet been told by Ahlan to find his son. The second dialog is during the romance plot, after being told by Ahlan to find his son. The third dialog is if Shen and Rahasia run away or are accepted by Nurik. The fourth dialog is if the player returns Shen to his father.
Exit points in conversation:
Exit stream 1: This conversation can end either with the droid telling the player to leave immediately (and Carth comments if present), or by allowing the player into the house to see Ahlan. The player is transported to the Matale main hall. The player can get a minor dark side hit if he threatens the droid.
Exit stream 2: The line is said and the conversation ends.
Exit stream 3: The line is said, Bastila intejects a comment if present, and the conversation ends.
Exit stream 4: The line is said, Canderous and Mission inteject comments if present, and the conversation ends.

// SCRIPTED // the first time player talks to ahlan in his house
Dialog Mission Statement The are the dialogs for Ahlan in his home. The first time the player talks to him, he offers then money to find his son Shen. Subsequent times, he says not to talk to him until they find his son.
Exit points in conversation:
Exit stream 1: The first conversation always ends by linking to the second one. DAN_DONE_AHLAN is set to TRUE to show that Ahlan has offered to pay the player money to find his son. If the player refuses, he gets a minor light side bonus. If he demands more money, he takes a medium dark side hit.
Exit stream 2: The line is said, the various companions can interject their lines, and the conversation ends.
